project_descr: The project aims to strengthen the environmental management information system within the Conservation and Environment Protected Authority to access data and information directly relevant for reporting on the three Rio Conventions.

outputs.output_descr: Cross-Cutting Capacity Development Project has the long-term goal to develop and manage information for better planning decisions that help protect the global environment.

document_name: PNG Cross-Cutting Capacity Development Project Proposal Initiation Plan
